com.broudy.gcm.control

Class ClientMessagesReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.control.ClientMessagesReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ClientMessagesReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is responsible for intercepting messages sent by the server. It matches each message to its repository.

    Note: the class implements Observer because of a mandatory requirement to use OCSF (Object Client Server Framework) given by my professors. TODO provide a more in-depth summary to ClientMessagesReceiver class!!!!!

    Created on the 4th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy
